doc.field: St. Peter's Church certificates of incorporation
St. Peter's Church certificates of incorporation

St. Peter's Church certificates of incorporation, dated 1832. St. Peter's was an African-American Episcopal church that met in the Apprentice's Library in the Brooklyn Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn.
